summary: Changes the dragon priest masks with mage-focused enchantments to be cloth, and includes the fix for Morokei\'s enchantment.
descriptionHtml:
---Description---
This mod makes Morokei, Nahkriin, and Vokun cloth and removes their armor so that mages can use the masks while still benefiting from Alteration\'s Mage Armor perk, and also includes the fix for Morokei\'s enchantment. I noticed that the only mod on here that makes this change didn\'t include the fix for Morokei\'s enchantment, which meant that it would break what the Unofficial Skyrim Patch fixed, requiring players to have another mod loaded after it that would fix Morokei again and also make it cloth. I felt that this was unnecessary, and since the author of the old mod hasn\'t been active since the end of 2011 I\'ve decided to create this mod to solve the problem. It\'s my first mod, but as the changes were very simple there shouldn\'t be any issues with it. If there are any bugs or you have any suggestions, let me know!

There is now an alternate version which removes the circlet classification from the masks, allowing you to wear them with hoods. As a side effect, this will also allow you to wear them with circlets. Only install the version you want to use, as they will overwrite each other.

---Conflicts---
Any mod that changes the properties of Morokei, Nahkriin, or Vokun may conflict with this mod.

---Changelog---
1.1: Fixed a problem where the masks would still interfere with the Mage Armor perk due to certain Editor IDs not being removed from them.

1.0: Release.
author: Marioface5
